Package com.pasdam.regexren.gui.rules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Rule
    All rules must implements this interface
    RuleFactoryListener
    Interface implemented by those classes that need to be notified of AbstractRuleFactory's changes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRuleFactory
    Derived class must call AbstractRuleFactory.configurationChanged() whenever their content changes
    ChangeCaseFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rules to change case of the name/extension
    ChangeCasePanel
    Panel used to configure a "Change case" rule
    InsertCounterAtPositionFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a counter at a specific position
    InsertCounterAtPositionPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Insert counter at position" rule
    InsertCounterBeforeAfterFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a counter before/after a specific pattern
    InsertCounterBeforeAfterPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Insert counter before/after pattern" rule
    InsertCounterOnCollisionFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a counter at a specific position
    InsertCounterOnCollisionPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Insert counter on collision" rule
    InsertTextAtPositionFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a text at a specific position
    InsertTextAtPositionPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Insert text at position" rule
    InsertTextBeforeAfterFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to insert a text before/after a specific pattern
    InsertTextBeforeAfterPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Insert text at before/after pattern" rule
    MoveTextBeforeAfterFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to move a text
    MoveTextBeforeAfterPanel
    Panel used to configure a "Move text..." rules
    RemovePanel
    Panel used to configure a "Replace..." rule
    ReplaceFactory
    AbstractRuleFactory used to create rule to replace/remove pattern from name/extension
    ReplacePanel
    Panel used to configure a "Replace..." rule
    TestReplaceFactory  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidParametersException
    Exception thrown when one or more parameters of a rule's factory are invalid
